tables.table_title: Representative Studies on distributed scheduling problems.
rows: MILP, heuristics and variable neighborhood descent VND methods
makespan, negative social impact, total energy consumption
three constructive heuristics and four metaheuristics
a MILP, three constructive heuristics, two VNS methods, and an IG algorithm
four MILP models and a CP model
makespan, maximum workload, total workload, earliness/tardiness
makespan, maximum workload, total energy consumption of factories

tables.table_title: Experimental parameters and factor level values.
Comparison between proposed algorithm (EDA-VNS) and CPLEX solver.
Performance comparison between EDA-VNS, EMA [40], DE-SA [37] and TS [2] to solve DFJSPC (average value over 30 runs).
Calculation of machine process energy consumption.
start time and completion time of all operations in machine process and crane transportation (unit: min).
